response.original_title: Cardiacs Live at the Town and Country Club, 1988
response.overview: oin us for an EXTRA SPECIAL YOUsTUBE WATCH PARTY featuring Cardiacs in all their majesty. This screening is a must-watch for anyone that missed (or misses) the thrills and spills of the 80s line-up featuring Tim, Jim, Sarah, Dom, Tim Q. and William. D. Drake, with assistance from The Consultant and Miss Swift. Doors 19:30, Curtain 20:00 sharp! That's BST, people
response.title: Cardiacs Live at the Town and Country Club, 1988
